question: In real-world physics, which statement best describes why planetary orbits remain stable beyond 2 AU?

options.C: Radiation pressure overwhelms gravity beyond 2 AU
options.D: Magnetic fields eject planets beyond 2 AU

options.C: Solar wind dominates gravity beyond 2 AU
